segments.text: Oh . I just wanted you to shut up . You were off-key anyway . Let me see that !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ... just grab it right out of my hands ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a cool see-through blue ! How do you wear this thing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That piece fits on to your ear . It hooks right on . And you just put the other one in your other ear .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I turn it on ?
segments.speaker: S1
